name: CITY OF RICHLAND HILLS, TEXAS
sampleDescriptions: FY 2026 appropriations legislation and implementation, provisions related to Community Project Funding and the Water Resources Development Act for water infrastructure projects.
Fiscal Year 2026 Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, including issues related to community project funding for wastewater infrastructure.
